title: Proper way to deal with trolls/ragers...?
body: How do you deal with trolls/ragers?  I try my best to let it roll off my back but I tend to talk back sometimes... I want to get better with dealing with this so does anyone have any tips for coping with/handling situations where a game is ruined when a teammate rages or decides to troll?

replies.body:
Yeah the rules around what's bannable are weird as hell in this game.
Whatever you do, don't try to engage with them as another human being and try to reason with them- you're more likely to get banned than they are, especially if it's physical trolling.
You don't get banned by engaging them as another human being. You generally get banned for raging at them.
I just mute all in every game now. Its not point in trying to communicate with people in this game anymore.
Don't type at all to them in game. If you see at the start their trolling wait till the games over then report them. Don't say report so and so in-game because that's verbal abuse.
mute and ignore then report at end of game
ignore them and focus on the game (or minimap)
